title: 88/588/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 November 1988 concerning the areas referred to in Article 3 (2) of Council Regulation (EEC) No 328/88 instituting a Community programme to assist the conversion of steel areas (Resider programme) (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 9 November 1988
concerning the areas referred to in Article 3 (2) of Council Regulation (EEC) No 328/88 instituting a Community programme to assist the conversion of steel areas (Resider programme)
(Only the French text is authentic)
(88/588/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The departments of Moselle, Meurthe-et-Moselle and Nord (excluding the district of Lille) in France are hereby found to satisfy the criteria in Article 3 (1) and the thresholds in Article 4 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 328/88. The Community programme instituted by that Regulation shall therefore apply to those areas.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 November 1988.
For the Commission
Peter SCHMIDHUBER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 33, 5. 2. 1988, p. 1.
